articles.title: Air Canada, WestJet flights more often delayed than other North American airlines, new data shows - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: The poor showing of Canada’s two biggest airlines signals the struggles the domestic industry is facing as it gears up after a long quiet period
articles.content:
